articles.description: BJ Hogg, who appeared on Game of Thrones and The Fall and was best known for being a part of Northern Ireland series Give My Head Peace, has died.
articles.content:
Northern Irish comedy actor BJ Hogg has died at 65. He made appearances in popular television shows Game of Thrones and The Fall. The cause of his death is not known.
